name: Sqwhere
description:
With more than 100 published boardgames and children games Reinhard Staupe is one of the most successful game designers. With Sqwhere he proves once again how fascinating easy ideas can be. 25 numbers have to be arragend as quickly as possible to a connected chain. You only have to follow ONE single rule.

The perfect Sqwhere from 1-25 is possible, but damn tough. Are you a genius? Or at least half a genius? Then you will make it! :-)
